ModMetaData.name: Medieval Shelling
ModMetaData.author: pdxthehunted
ModMetaData.description:
Adds three medieval-tech shells to be used in conjunction with the SRTS Medieval Expanded Tweaks and Translation military dirigible. Technically can also be used with a mortar. They require a new research "Medieval Shelling" and are craftable at the Stonecutter Bench. They are a little more labor-intensive than vanilla shells and weigh quite a bit more, but are roughly as effective. This is my first mod with original artwork.
Eventually I would like to patch this mod to add the Gunpowder research prerequisite from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval, and to make them launchable from the Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security catapult, but I wanted to release the mod now so that medieval pilots have RP-appropriate bombs to drop on their neighbors.
